Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 106th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 26 South Shore Express buses temp rerouted via 103rd, Torrence,104th, Commercial, 100th, Avenue L & 95th, due to street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Torrence,104th, Commercial, 100th, Avenue L and 95th, due to street blockage near 106th/Buffalo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier injured employee. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier injured employee.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
